backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining theme variables and light/dark color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting app metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with tab navigation for prediction, history, and Android APK help.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky header showing the app icon and title text.
frontend/src/components/MobilePageContai: Layout wrapper constraining content width for mobile-focused design.
frontend/src/components/SkipToContent.ts: Accessibility link allowing keyboard users to jump to main content.
Multi-step race entry form handling fractional odds input, prediction, validation, and saving.
frontend/src/features/entries/types.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining race entries, contenders, and form data.
frontend/src/features/entries/validation: Validation helpers ensuring valid contenders, odds, and winner selection.
frontend/src/features/help/AndroidApkHel: UI card explaining how to convert the web app into an Android APK using a WebView-based generator with step-by-step instructions.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryLis: Displays a sorted list of past race predictions with correctness badges, contender details, and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/features/learning/LearningS: Shows learning metrics such as accuracy and recent accuracy, with progress bars and summaries based on stored race data.
frontend/src/features/learning/metrics.t: Computes total races, correct predictions, and overall and recent accuracy from race entry data.
frontend/src/features/learning/model.ts: Generates a predicted winner and confidence score based on contender odds and learned historical stats.
frontend/src/features/reset/ResetAppMemo: Button with confirmation dialog that resets stored race data and learned state, triggering a toast message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global styles, and a custom OKLCH color theme with light/dark variants.
frontend/src/lib/oddsFormat.ts: Provides simple helpers to format numeric odds as fractional strings with optional placeholder.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges and deduplicates class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/storage/localMemoryStore.ts: Implements loading, saving, clearing, and computing learned race data in localStorage.
frontend/src/storage/storageKeys.ts: Defines storage version and keys used for persisting entries and learned state.
frontend/src/storage/useOnDeviceMemory.t: React hook managing entries and learned state with load, save, recompute, and reset functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the build.
